Header: Wanni Other Ranks Undergo Swimming Practices
Content: On  the directions of the Commander, Security Forces-Wanni, Major General Jagath Gunawardena, a basic Swimming Course was introduced to Other Ranks during  02-06 September at 4 Sri Lanka Signal Corps HQ in Anuradhapura where the Security Force Headquarters - Wanni (SFHQ-W) Swimming Pool is located. The course was conducted by Headquarters 21 Division under the supervision of the General Officer Commanding, 21 Division, Major General Kumar Jayapathirane. A qualified and well-experienced team of Army swimming instructors provided training assistance for this Basic Swimming Course. Representing all Divisions and Forward Maintenance Area (North Central), a total 51 Other Ranks participated in the course.
